tool_description: Monitors and logs temperature conditions for samples, storage areas, and transport containers to ensure cold chain compliance.

monitor_location.description: Location being monitored (storage unit ID, transport container, etc.)

acceptable_range.description: Acceptable temperature deviation in degrees Celsius

error_messages: Invalid location: monitor_location is not recognized or not equipped with temperature monitoring.
Invalid monitoring period: monitoring_period_hours must be a positive integer.
Invalid temperature range: target_temperature and acceptable_range must be valid numbers.
Monitor not available: Temperature monitoring equipment is not available or malfunctioning.
usage: Set up temperature monitoring by specifying monitor_location, monitoring_period_hours, target_temperature, and acceptable_range. The tool tracks temperature compliance over the specified period.

monitoring_id.description: Unique identifier for this monitoring session

temperature_compliant.description: Whether temperature is within acceptable range

alert_triggered.description: Whether any temperature alerts were triggered
